name: Archio XML Organization to GEMMA OAS
description: Maps Organization objects from XML to JSON format

mapping.label: label.#text
mapping.item: {% if item|default %}{% if item.label|default or item['@attributes']|default %}[{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Organization_to_GEMMA_OAS.json", item)|json_encode }}]{% else %}{{ executeMapping("https://vng.accept.commonground.nu/Mapping-Archio_XML_Organization_to_GEMMA_OAS.json", item, true)|json_encode }}{% endif %}{% else %}[]{% endif %}
